sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia adalah seorang bajak laut terkenal di lautan.
english translation: "He is a famous pirate on the sea."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya suka membeli baju baru setiap bulan.
english translation: "I like to buy new clothes every month."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Setiap malam, aku mengenakan baju tidur yang nyaman.
english translation: "Every night, I wear comfortable pajamas."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong bawakan aku sebuah bak untuk memasak.
english translation: "Please bring me a tray for cooking."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku akan berangkat ke bandar udara jam 7 pagi besok.
english translation: "I will depart to the airport at 7am tomorrow."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Hari ini cuacanya panas banget!
english translation: "Today the weather is very hot!"

sentence in indonesian using the words: Keluarga itu merupakan keluarga bangsawan dari generasi ke generasi.
english translation: "That family is a noble family from generation to generation."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku butuh bantuan untuk mengangkat kotak ini.
english translation: "I need help to lift this box."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Terima kasih atas bantuannya selama ini.
english translation: "Thank you for your assistance all this time."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Toko ini menjual banyak jenis makanan.
english translation: "This store sells many types of food."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bapak saya sedang bekerja di kantor.
english translation: "My father is working at the office."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku akan datang ke pesta barangkali.
english translation: "Perhaps I will come to the party."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Rumah kami terletak di barat daya kota.
english translation: "Our house is located in the southwest of the city."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pulau itu terletak di barat laut Samudra Hindia.
english translation: "The island is located in the northwest of the Indian Ocean."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku memakai baju batik untuk acara pernikahan ini.
english translation: "I am wearing a batik dress for this wedding event."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bawang merah adalah salah satu bahan utama dalam masakan ini.
english translation: "Shallot is one of the main ingredients in this dish."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Setiap orang berhak hidup bebas dan berbahagia.
english translation: "Everyone has the right to live free and happy."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Di kampungku, ada banyak becak sebagai transportasi umum.
english translation: "In my village, there are many pedicabs as public transportation."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Operasi bedah sangat penting untuk menyelamatkan nyawa pasien.
english translation: "Surgery is very important to save the patient's life."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong jangan tanggalkan lencanamu begini.
english translation: "Please don't take off your apron like this."
